participant_1.background:
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.
i write.
I'm a worrywart, but I love to play video games to take my mind off things.
I grew up in an orphanage, as my parents died when I was young.
i am an anime fan.

My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it.
I tend to drop things when my stomach is empty.
i am a cyclist.
i had a gig at local theater last night.
i love hot wings.

content.text: Hey! I love anime too! What's your favorite?
Oh, that's cool! I love so many, but my favorite would probably have to be Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood! What about you?
I love that one too! My favorite is probably Hunter x Hunter though.
Oh, I've heard good things about that one! I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good. What kind of art do you do?
I'm a painter, mostly. I also do some sculpting and digital art sometimes.
That's awesome! I wish I could paint, but I'm not very good at it.
It takes a lot of practice, but anyone can do it!
I guess I'll have to start practicing then!
